name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions. Dice cucumber and tomatoes. Mix with cooked quinoa, crumbled feta, olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs. Serve chilled.

name: Black Bean Sweet Potato Tacos
instructions: Roast diced sweet potatoes with spices. Warm tortillas and black beans. Assemble tacos with sweet potatoes, beans, avocado, and cilantro. Squeeze lime over top.

name: Protein-Packed Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, spinach, protein powder, and almond milk until smooth. Pour into bowl and top with chia seeds, berries, and granola.
